thread.section_title: Business & Financial News, U.S & International Breaking News | Reuters
thread.title: Senators try building support for new bipartisan immigration bill

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Senators try building support for new bipartisan immigration bill
text:
A bipartisan group of senators has crafted a new immigration bill that would protect 1.8 million young, undocumented immigrants from deportation and establish a $25 billion fund to repel illegal border crossings, Republican Senator Lindsey Graham said on Wednesday.
Republican Senator Jeff Flake said backers were attempting to build support for the measure that could be voted on by Thursday, even though it does not address all of President Donald Trumpâ€™s demands for any immigration legislation.
Reporting By Richard CowanEditing by Chizu Nomiyama
